---
title: "Hands On Ex 00: Working with Tidyverse"
author: "Yee Jun Yit"

  echo: true
  eval: true
  warning: false
  freeze: true
---



# Getting started:

## Load tidyverse into r env by using code chunk below



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::



Importing data (Old way - deprecated)



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis_csv <- read.csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
```
:::



## Importing data (New way) - uses readr to import as a tibble data.frame



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019 <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_fat <- read_csv("data/PopData2019_fat.csv")
```
:::


## Pivoting data (the indented function is processed on popdata_fat, called "pipe")


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_long = popdata_fat %>%
  pivot_longer(c(3:21),
               names_to = "Age Group",
               values_to = "Population")
```
:::



## Writing the file to a r data serialisation, remember to add rds folder to .gitignore as it is a data folder



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_rds(popdata_long, "rds/popdata_long.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
popdata_long = read_rds("rds/popdata_long.rds")
```
:::



## Working with dplyr:

### select function


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_selected = realis2019 %>%
  select('Project Name',
         'Type of Sale',
         'Unit Price ($ psm)',
         'Property Type')
realis2019_selected
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 19,515 × 4
   `Project Name`           `Type of Sale` `Unit Price ($ psm)` `Property Type` 
   <chr>                    <chr>                         <dbl> <chr>           
 1 PEIRCE VIEW              Resale                         7434 Condominium     
 2 FLORIDA PARK             Resale                         9737 Semi-Detached H…
 3 BULLION PARK             Resale                        11467 Condominium     
 4 CASTLE GREEN             Resale                         9346 Condominium     
 5 HAPPY ESTATE             Resale                        10183 Semi-Detached H…
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE Resale                        12659 Terrace House   
 7 THE PANORAMA             Resale                        16064 Condominium     
 8 THE PANORAMA             Resale                        16905 Condominium     
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN         Resale                        13500 Terrace House   
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING ESTATE Resale                         9935 Terrace House   
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
```


:::
:::


### filter function


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_filtered = realis2019_selected %>%
  filter('Property Type' =="Condominium" |
          'Property Type'== "Apartment") %>%
  filter('Type of Sale' == "New Sale") %>%
  filter('Unit Price ($ psm)' <= 13000)
```
:::


###combining both functions


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
realis2019_combined = realis2019 %>%
  select('Project Name',
         'Type of Sale',
         'Unit Price ($ psm)',
         'Property Type') %>%
  filter('Property Type' =="Condominium" |
          'Property Type'== "Apartment") %>%
  filter('Type of Sale' == "New Sale") %>%
  filter('Unit Price ($ psm)' <= 13000)
realis2019_combined
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 0 × 4
# ℹ 4 variables: Project Name <chr>, Type of Sale <chr>,
#   Unit Price ($ psm) <dbl>, Property Type <chr>
```


:::
:::
